name: Zombie Krul
description:
Free as part of The Reactor: https://www.patreon.com/Clickteam

Zombie Krul is a undead filled overhead shooter example with awesome combat action and a outstanding shadow/lighting engine. Play through seven levels of action as you escort scientists out of danger. Then open up the example in Fusion and learn how it's done in the less then 250 events. Shader included!

Features

  • Outstanding shadow/lighting engine
  • Multiple weapon and zombie types
  • multiple key configuration example
  • Basic dead reckoning example
  • Shader included
